description.@en: Imbibing the innards, the person begins heaving up any and all ‘impurities’ they are suffering from.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch can attempt a Toughness Test. If successful, they are cured of any Intoxication and Poison Effects they are suffering from. The spell also cures their Frostbite. If they fail, they suffer [[/roll 1D10+1]] physical Peril and are left Helpless for an hour. A Character may only gain the benefit of this Magick once per day.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but they are also cured of one Disease they are suffering from.

criticalFailure.@en: Your touch brings great sadness, as the person you touch suffers from Frostbite on their fingers.

reagents.@en: The guts of a frozen fish, consumed (expended)

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
